question: You work at home and have a problem with a piece of equipment that you for your job. Write a letter to the shop or company to which supplied the equipment. In your letter-describe the problem with the equipment -explain how this problem is affecting your work -say what to want the shop or the company to do
text: I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the product of your company which I purchased from the online shop. I have recently ordered the Dell notebook 123 from eBay. Unfortunately, when I was taking off the packaging, it has some fractures on the monitor that makes me unable to work.

In the meantime, I am quite very busy ,therefore, I am a teacher that I have to do an online class. My old notebook was used often and almost every day that cause  I decided to buy a new one for the stronger potential to work. Suddenly, when I got a new then my old one has broken down, so I change to the new one but it also unable to work. I am so disappointed with your product. However, in my ,opinion I do not think this mistake was from your absolutely it probably was from the delivery time. Anyways, I would like you to be responsible for this situation.
I, therefore, suggest that you replace the item, or I will be given a full refund, as a warranty covers it.
Thanks in advance for your matter attention, and I would like to ensure that this problem does not happen in the future.
